doc.title: Truck Universe
doc.plot: As a how-to show dedicated exclusively to trucks, 4x4s and SUVs, Truck U finds monster-truck expert Matt Steele and master Drag Racer Bruno Massel involved in hands-on projects crucial to serious offroading and truck performance. Ideal for reaching the flourishing truck, 4x4, SUV, sport-compact truck and offroad audiences. Bruno Massel is an accomplished television host and professional drag racer on the NHRA national tour. He has hosted programs on TNN, SPEED, ESPN2, Spike, Oxygen and Discovery. In addition to Truck U, Bruno currently hosts NHRA's Xplod Sport Compact Drag Racing Series and Xplod Stylefest, Oxygen's Fitness Insider and BBC / Discovery's Top Gear.
